Articles.Content: I'm not sure if this should really be here, but how to you get the ribbons that people have in their sigs. All I know is that you need to do stuff to get them.....

^^^That.

And folks have asked about the ribbons before in the how-to area; asking about them is not a big deal.
Can anyone see my ribbons? I made a thing of ribbons, put it in my sig, and saved it, but I don't see it.

Can anyone see my ribbons? I made a thing of ribbons, put it in my sig, and saved it, but I don't see it.

I see a... Minmus and Mun ribbons?

Nice thing about the generator is that you can now login and just add them without having to redo the whole thing and it updates automatically on your KSP forum sig

(Mine's like, Sun, Kerbin, Mun, Minmus, Duna, Ike, Dres. Jool and its moons are coming really soon )

I see a... Minmus and Mun ribbons?

Nice thing about the generator is that you can now login and just add them without having to redo the whole thing and it updates automatically on your KSP forum sig

(Mine's like, Sun, Kerbin, Mun, Minmus, Duna, Ike, Dres. Jool and its moons are coming really soon )

Ah yes. Now I see them. I think it took a little bit to activate or something.
For some reason, my ribbon won't show up, so I've removed it. :/

Edit your signature under settings. I have mine set up to use the direct link to the image provided by the site, i.e. something that looks like this:

[*center][*img]http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/image.php?ribbon=(your number here)[*/img][*/center]

Don't put the asterisks in the tags; I just have those there so it won't render out. Save your settings and you should be good to go.
